# vImage_PerpsectiveTransform.Interpolation

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe the projective-transformation interpolation method.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Interpolation
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **vImage_PerpsectiveTransform.Interpolation.linear**: A constant that specifies linear interpolation.
- **vImage_PerpsectiveTransform.Interpolation.nearest**: A constant that specifies nearest-neighbor interpolation.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: A constant that specifies linear interpolation.
items.name: vImage_PerpsectiveTransform.Interpolation.linear

items.description: A constant that specifies nearest-neighbor interpolation.
